title: For the FIFA fans
author: VD
content_html:
I will be live-blogging the Champion’s League final between AC Milan and Liverpool tonight. In case you’re interested, it starts at 1 PM Central time.

Not that I’m biased or anything, but… forza Milan!

UPDATE – Or maybe not. Satellite is down. I suspect the Blogger Blaster.
content_text:
I will be live-blogging the Champion’s League final between AC Milan and Liverpool tonight.  In case you’re interested, it starts at 1 PM Central time.
Not that I’m biased or anything, but… forza Milan!
UPDATE – Or maybe not.  Satellite is down.  I suspect the Blogger Blaster.
